basics.name: Lloyd Villanueva
basics.label: Mathematical Physicist turned Data Scientist
basics.summary: Mathematical Physicist turned Data Scientist, with future aspiration to do a doctorate degree in Earth systems. He envision to have a novel contribution to the field using his rigorous training in mathematical physics and experience in data science.

work.summary: Handled lecture and/or laboratory classes on the following topics: classical mechanics, electrodynamics, thermodynamics, optics, and numerical methods
